text: Narayan Desai (24 December 1924 â€“ 15 March 2015) was an Indian Gandhian and author. He was the son of Mahatma Gandhi's personal secretary and biographer Mahadev Desai.Pandiri, Ananda M. A Comprehensive, Annotated Bibliography on Mahatma Gandhi. Westport, CT: Greenwood Press, 1995. 35. He was born in Bulsar (now Valsad), Gujarat. During his career, he wrote many books about the ideas and life of Gandhi. Desai died in Surat, India from a short-illness, aged 90. ==References== Category:1924 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Indian activists Category:20th-century Indian writers
